Package index

mapgl

tmap.mapgl tmap.mapgl-package
Extensions to 'tmap' with Two New Modes: 'mapbox' and 'maplibre'

Set mode specific options

tm_mapbox()
Mapbox mode options
tm_maplibre()
Maplibre mode options

Polygons in 3d

tm_polygons_3d() opt_tm_polygons_3d()
Map layer: polygons in 3d (experimental)

Geocoder component

tm_geocoder()
Map component: (credits) text

Wheather layers

tm_rain()
Map layer: let it rain!
tm_snow()
Map layer: let it snow!

Export

tmap_mapbox() tmap_maplibre()
Export tmap to mapbox and maplibre
